Parser

Class State

  • java.lang.Object
    • Parser.State

  • public class State
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines a state in which the Turing Machine simulator can be in. A state consists of a mnemonic name which identifies it, and a list of transitions. Note: This class now also defines some graphic properties for the state.
    See Also:
    Transition
